title: You Gotta Keep Dancin'
description: YOU CAN CHOOSE JOY  Life can be tough. Stress, disappointment, heartache, hurt and #150;all are part of the human condition. But while pain is unavoidable, misery is optional! The freeing message of You Gotta Keep Dancin and #146; is that, no matter what your circumstances, you can choose to be joyful.  Tim Hansel speaks as one who knows. But You Gotta Keep Dancin and #146; is not just another story of a Christian who had an accident. Tim doesn and #146;t treat lightly the difficulties of anyone and #146;s life. In his words, and #147;this book is in no way meant to diminish the awfulness of pain, tragedy, and affliction. I don and #146;t want to and #145;celebrate pain, and #146; but more deeply understand the dignity of what can happen in it, through it, and because of it. and #148;  Tim Hansel is the founder of Summit Expedition, a wilderness survival school for individuals seeking deeper experiences with themselves, others, and God. He makes his home in San Dimas, California, with his wife.  You have changed my sadness into a joyful dance. Psalm 30:11
